title: Virtual File System
description: Developed a project replicating a Linux File System, implementing core data structures like the Incore Inode Table, File Table, and User File Descriptor Table.

title: Data Structure Library
description: Created a C++ library featuring versatile implementations of essential data structures, addressing a wide range of fundamental to complex operations.

title: Customised Database Management System
description: Developed a console-based DBMS in Java that supports string queries for various operations, with a custom database structure using linked lists.

title: Profile Portfolio
description: Built a personal portfolio website using React.js, showcasing projects, skills, and contact information in a user-friendly interface.
